title.narrative: F.a: Protection of the Ecology and the Environment in Tiruvannamalai District

description.narrative: The project aim is to enhance the skills and capacities of Dalit and Tribal communities on lobbying and advocacy for assertion of their traditional rights, to sensitize the communities on issues pertaining to the environmental degradation of the base of li velihoods, and to mobilize them to address those issues and protect the ecology and environment collectively. Project activities are: Baseline study of Conservation Protection and Management Plans with two studies, Local sensitization on Conservation and M anagement Plans, Sensitizing the community on and involving them on promotion of ecology, 4. Capacity building workshops for cadres on environmental legislation, Promoting sustainable agriculture, Formation of Environment Protection Forum /EcoClubs, Streng thening the existing platform of Dalit women movement and other movements, Strengthening the community on advocacy for policy decisions, Lobbying carried out with the officials and policy makers regarding the implementation of the projects that are infring ement to the rights of the communities, Issue based (need based) campaigns like petitions, media work and demonstrations, Review meetings for compiling the results and improvements. RWDS was established in 1985 and it works for protection and promotion of the comprehensive rights of the Dalit and tribal women and children of Tiruvannamalai district. The main focus of the organisation has been sustainable environment and protection of the livelihood rights. The organisation is run by women. It has received f unding from many local and foreign donors, including the Embassy of Netherlands, HIVOS and Siemenpuu. RWDS has cooperated with many local NGOs and networks, including VCDS and JASuL.
